oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The song of the !na !na'rishe (a large bird). It sings of the disappearance of the people from its country. 1) 9186v: description and diet of the !na !na'rishe bird, 2) See also The song of the ||gani (a bird) and The song of the !korro-ssin !ku (or Pit-making Bushmen) and A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (or Sun Bushmen) and Song of the ||ku and Song of the !kan ||ka ||karashe and The song of the Sauko and The song of the ||noruko djo-djo and The song of the mother of the little buck and The song of the =na=n'arro and The song of the Ngogan-a (a little bird) and The song of the !ke tsa'ba (a bird), 3) This is found in Book XI & XII-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The song of the !na !na'rishe (a bird)
